plugins.name: Colorama
plugins.description:
Type in a hex color value and generate a 0-1000 number range for your primitive tokens. Not sure if this should be closer to 100, 200, or somewhere in between? Plug your values into Colorama and get a precise variable name.


Want them on your canvas? Just a click away.


Need your dark color values to be lower on the number scale? Select the direction to flip the number order on light/dark tones. Then click to copy and paste the values into your Figma variables collection.


Run several values at once with a comma separated text string. For example:

#ff0000, #123ABC, #223344
plugins.tagline: A powerful yet simple way to name your design tokens as primitive variables in Figma.

plugins.name: Companion
plugins.description:
Advanced Color Finder [PRO Feature]

A powerful tool that allows you to search for colors across your files.

  1. Ultra-fast search algorithm with advanced labeling
  2. Colors are grouped by type (variable or style) and by source (Remote or local libraries)
  3. Ability to search by variable name, color hex and by layer name
  4. Display number of matching results per color
  5. Select all or individual layers that matches the selected color


Style Guide Generator [Free]

  1. Transform your color collections into a beautiful style guide
  2. Choose one or more color formats to display (HEX, RGB, HSL)
  3. Support for cross-collections linked variables


Contrast Checker [Free]

  1. Check for AA and AAA level compliance
  2. Interactive and instant results when adjusting colors
  3. Live preview and swap foreground and background colors
  4. Get results for for text (Small / Large) and graphics elements


Tints & Shades Generator [Free]

  1. Interactive generator with live colors preview
  2. Ability to customize the number of generated colors
  3. Built-in contrast checker
  4. Preview generated colors on canvas
  5. Save generated colors to variables


Color Converter [Free]

  1. Convert any given color to popular color formats
  2. Currently supports HEX, RGB, HSL, CMYK, HSV, OKLCH and LAB
  3. Select and copy results


―――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――


Sort Layers [Free]

A set of different ways to sort your layers within Figma.

  1. Alphabetical sorting (A-Z or Z-A)
  2. Sort by X or Y position on the canvas
  3. Sort by layer type (Frame, text, group, section, etc…)
  4. Reverse current sorting
  5. Magically sort everything based on names and positions


Distribute Layers [Free]

A powered up version of Figma’s built-in distribute feature.

  1. Distribute selected layers horizontally or vertically
  2. Set a desired value for the space between layers
  3. Ability to align layers from top (in horizontal mode) or left (in vertical mode)


Display As Grid [Free]

Quickly rearrange selected layers in a grid layout with improved alignment and sorting features

  1. Ability to choose the number of columns along with vertical and horizontal gaps
  2. Ability to align columns vertically or not
  3. Extra sorting capabilities for better organization


Hidden Layers [PRO Feature]

Simple yet powerful tool to bulk manage hidden layers. It allows you to

  1. Hide selected layers
  2. Show all hidden layers within a page or within a selection
  3. Select all hidden layers within a page or within a selection
  4. Delete all hidden layers within a page or within a selection


Locked Layers [Free]

Simple yet powerful tool to bulk manage locked layers. It allows you to

  1. Lock or unlock selected layers
  2. Lock or unlock all layers on a page


Remove Numbers [PRO Feature]

Get rid of all those annoying numbers that Figma automatically generates. A single click gets the job done


Ungroup Single Layers Group [PRO Feature]

Optimize your files by ungrouping single layers group or deleting empty groups


Start at 0, 0 [PRO Feature]

It’s just the cherry on top. A file is never tidy unless you start at 0, 0 — and for that, we got you covered


―――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――


Fix Detached Instances [PRO Feature]

Preview and fix all detached instances within your files.

  1. Find all detached instances across pages
  2. Preview of the original component versus the detached instance
  3. Link instance to original component
  4. Maintain all manual overrides


―――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――


Deep Search [PRO Feature]

Deep Search is a unique and ultra-fast way to find any layer within your file, in a simple yet powerful search tool. The search algorithm has been thoroughly optimized for speed, especially for large files.


Below is how it works:

  1. Start by selecting the layer type (Frame, text, rectangle, etc.) or choose “All Layers” to search everything
  2. Choose one or more properties to search for (Fill color, width, font, opacity and many many more). You can also use the Quick Search box to search for any property from the list for easier access
  3. Hit the search button and voilà. Results are there.
  4. Browse the list of matching search results, with ability to filter by layer name.
  5. Click on a result to view it on the canvas or click “Select All” to bulk select all matching results


Here are some example scenarios:

  1. [Simple] ― Find all text layers with the font “Inter” and font weight “Semi Bold”
  2. [Simple] ― Find all rectangles with a corner radius of 16 and corner smoothing of 60%
  3. [Medium] ― Find all instances of a component named “Button” that are hidden and have been detached
  4. [Medium] ― Find all auto layouts that have a minimum width of at least 393px
  5. [Advanced] ― Find all instances of an external library component named “Input” that are marked as ready for dev and whose top left corner radius is less than or equal to 20px
  6. [Advanced] ― Find all layers that have a hidden stroke, have a blend mode applied and whose name include the characters “es”


In short, the possibilities are endless


―――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――


MagiConnect [PRO Feature]

MagiConnect is a simple and easy to use tool that allows you to draw connectors between your frames


Here are some key features:

  1. Auto-draw mode: When enabled, it allows you to quickly draw connectors between any two elements you select on the canvas. The direction of the connector arrow is based on the selection order
  2. Manual mode was designed to give you more flexibility in accessing nested layers before drawing a connector. It’s slower for sure, but gives you more control
  3. You can customize the connector by adjusting the color, opacity, stroke width, radius and stroke style
  4. If you’re not happy with the connector customizations, you can always reset all values to their default state from the manage menu
  5. You can also add an optional description to annotate the connector
  6. The tool will always remember your last used settings whenever it’s launched the next time.
  7. You can update specific connectors within a selection or update globally across a page
  8. In cases where a fresh start is the way to go, simple go to “Manage” and select “Remove all connectors”. This will delete all connectors you’ve added on this page


―――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――


When you purchase the license, you will get a lifetime unlimited access to the plugin, and all to the upcoming features that i’m planning to add. Some really exciting features are coming soon. This is truly the beginning.


Due to limitations from Figma, you can only access PRO features from the account you purchased the license on. You will not be able to access PRO features from connected accounts and must purchase the license again if you want to use it on another account.


Future releases of the plugin might not be at the current price tag.


If you made it this far, I salute you for your patience.


For any questions, ideas, bugs or complaints, I would love to hear from you. Please feel free to reach out.


Built with ❤️
plugins.tagline: The all-in-one plugin you never knew you needed

Need quick feedback on a design?

As a designer, sometimes we need to bounce our ideas off someone to quickly get some feedback. A lot of us work remotely and some of us are the only designer on our team. That makes getting feedback quickly not as easy.


New to design?

plugins.name: Component Crafter
plugins.description:
Quickly and easily create and manage your components


Features


1.Create Components or Component Sets

Convert any selected layers into components or component sets, with an option to replace them with their instances.


2.Add layers Directly to Existing Components


3.Replace with Component Instances

Swap selected layers with component instances for better design consistency.


4.Advanced Selection Options

Select layers by shared properties before converting them into components.


5.Clone as New Components


6.Instance Management

  1. Select instances on the current page.
  2. Detach instances on the page or across the file.


7.Detach Components

Break components into editable layers while preserving their appearance.


8.Decompose a Component


9.Multi-Language Support
plugins.tagline: Quickly and easily create and manage your components

plugins.name: Nong's Content Filler
plugins.description:
Usage:

  1. Fill Specific Content: Select the text that needs to be filled (single or multiple selections), click the type button, and the relevant content will be automatically filled.
  2. Custom Fill: Select the text that needs to be filled (single or multiple selections), enter custom content in the text box (one entry per line), and click the Apply button. The selected text will be automatically filled with the custom content.
  3. Chinese-English Translation: Select the text that needs to be filled (single selection), enter Chinese content in the text box, and click the Translate button. The translated English content will be automatically filled in the selected text.


使用方式：

  1. 填充特定内容：选择需要填充的文字（单个或多个），点击类型按钮，则自动填充相关内容。
  2. 自定义填充：选择需要填充的文字（单个或多个），在文本框内输入自定义内容（每行一个），点击Apply按钮，则自动填充成输入的自定义内容。
  3. 中英翻译：选择需要填充的文字（单个），在文本框内输入中文内容，点击Translate按钮，则翻译好的英文会自动填充到选择的文字上。
plugins.tagline: Quick Fill Content & Translate

plugins.name: Create
plugins.description:

plugins.name: ThumbSpan
plugins.description:
ThumbSpan helps you determine which UI elements

are particularly hard to reach with the thumb while using

the phone one-handed.


The Area of Reach of the thumb has been based on empirical evidence, sourced from academic studies. Please see the last picture for the current supported one-handed phone positions, more to be added soon...


How Does it Work

  1. ThumbSpan adds a gradient Layer to your frames.
  2. It is recommended to apply it on a copy of the frame
  3. The Copy should not have any Auto Layout.
  4. It allows you to select Opacity and Hand Position
  5. It also allows you to select between Left and Right Hand
  6. These Layers can be cascaded - applied one after another (You can apply it for both Left and Right hand together)




This Plugin is still in Beta, Please send any bug reports and feature requests to my email: its.shahab.khan10@gmail.com
plugins.tagline: Check which parts of your UI within the average thumbspan

plugins.name: Token Loader
plugins.description:
Generate a `tokens.json` using something like Style Dictionary.


example tokens.json:


[
{
"name": "core/color/black",
"value": "#000000"
},
{
"name": "alias/color/black",
"value": "#000000",
"aliasOf": "core/color/black"
}
]


Typescript types for the tokens:


interface VariableToken {
name: string; // an/example/name
value: unknown;
}

interface AliasToken extends VariableToken {
aliasOf: VariableToken['name'];
}

type Token = VariableToken | AliasToken;


Next, you can drop in that tokens.json on the plugin window to automatically generate tokens.


Note! It will drop unused ones from the collection, and update existing.
plugins.tagline: A plugin to load tokens (from StyleDictionary), and convert them in to Local Variables

plugins.name: Protege AI
plugins.description:
Protege AI for Figma: Legal Compliance, Simplified

Contact founders@protegecounsel.ai to get a trial account.


In the dynamic realm of marketing, aligning content with legal standards is crucial yet challenging. Protege AI for Figma is crafted to empower in-house legal teams, offering a robust tool to review marketing materials quickly and effectively. This Figma plugin integrates flawlessly into your design workflow, using advanced AI to identify and highlight legal concerns in real time.


Key Features:


  1. Automated Content Analysis: Deploy state-of-the-art AI to scan designs for legal issues like copyright infringement, regulatory non-compliance, and sensitive language.
  2. Real-Time Feedback: Instantly receive suggestions and edits within Figma, enabling swift adjustments and compliance checks.
  3. Customizable Legal Libraries: Adjust the AI’s scanning abilities to match your specific legal standards and requirements, ensuring a tailored and relevant review.
  4. Collaborative Review Process:** Enhance cooperation between legal and marketing teams with in-document comments and edits, making the review and approval process smoother.
  5. Comprehensive Reporting:** Produce in-depth reports on the legal review process, including issues identified and resolutions, for compliance tracking and audit trails.


Benefits:


  1. Save Time and Resources: Significantly cut down on the time dedicated to reviewing marketing materials, freeing your legal team for more strategic tasks.
  2. Enhance Accuracy: Reduce the risk of missing legal issues with the AI’s detailed analysis.
  3. Improve Collaboration: Foster a more efficient and collaborative relationship between your legal and marketing departments.
  4. Ensure Compliance: Keep up with changes in regulations with an AI tool that adapts to new legal standards.


Ideal For:


  1. In-house legal teams aiming to enhance the review of marketing content directly within Figma.
  2. Marketing teams looking to accelerate compliance and mitigate legal risks in their creative.
  3. Legal professionals seeking to utilize technology for more efficient and integrated workflows.
plugins.tagline: Protege AI: Streamline Legal Reviews for Creative & Marketing

Persistent Authorization
------------------------------------
The plugin now retains your Pinterest authorization between sessions, so you no longer need to reauthorize each time.

Pinterest Account Management

plugins.name: QR Code Styler
plugins.description:
QR Code Styler is a feature-packed Figma plugin that allows you to generate and fully customize QR codes directly within your design workflow. Whether you need a simple black-and-white QR code or a beautifully styled one that matches your brand identity, this plugin provides complete creative control.


How It Works:


1. QR Code Generation

Instantly create a QR code by entering any URL, text, or data string. With just a few clicks, the plugin generates a scannable QR code, ready to be styled to fit your design.


Supported Formats:

  1. URLs
  2. email addresses
  3. phone numbers
  4. vCards
  5. plain text


2. Customization Options

Transform standard QR codes into visually appealing design elements with powerful customization features:


  1. Shape Adjustments: Customize the corner radius and dot styles for a unique aesthetic.
  2. Logo Embedding: Place a logo or icon at the center without compromising scannability.


3. Error Correction & Optimization

Ensure scannability even with complex designs by adjusting error correction levels. The plugin optimizes QR codes to remain readable while allowing for creative styling.


Key Features:


Instant QR Code Generation – Create QR codes with various data types in seconds.

Advanced Styling – Customize colors, shapes to match your design.

Logo Embedding – Insert brand logos while maintaining scannability.

Smart Optimization – Adjust error correction levels for reliable scanning.
plugins.tagline: Generate and fully customize QR codes directly within your design workflow.

plugins.description:
Turn your ideas into stunning color palettes in seconds! ✨ text2palette uses AI to generate beautiful, well-balanced color schemes based on any text prompt. Whether you're designing UI, graphics, branding, or illustrations, this plugin makes color selection effortless.


🔹 How It Works:

  1. Describe your vision (e.g., "Sunset in Tokyo" or "Cyberpunk Neon").
  2. Choose the number of colors (2-8).
  3. Generate & preview your AI-powered palette.
  4. Insert the colors as rectangles in Figma with one click.

⚡ Optimized for UI/UX, graphic design, and digital art.

🔑 Uses OpenAI to generate high-quality palettes (API key required).


🎨 Transform words into color with text2palette – your creative assistant for color magic! 🚀

plugins.name: Stronde for Email – Figma Images in Mobile & Dark-Mode HTML Emails (ESP Integration: HubSpot, Klaviy
plugins.description:
What is Stronde for Email’s Figma Plugin?

The Stronde for Email Figma Plugin lets you export Figma images directly into Stronde for Email and/or your ESP (Salesforce Marketing Cloud, Pardot, Marketo, HubSpot, Klaviyo, and more). These images are then added to HTML emails, already optimized for mobile and dark mode.


Stronde for Email is a powerful email creation platform designed to simplify email design and collaboration for marketing teams, agencies, and enterprises. It enables teams to build, approve, and sync marketing emails seamlessly across platforms.


📌 Learn more about our customers: strondeforemail.com/customers/

📌 Explore our integrations: strondeforemail.com/integrations/

📌 Discover Stronde for Email features: strondeforemail.com/


Why Use Stronde for Email’s Figma Plugin?

  1. 🚀 One-click export – Send Figma images directly to Stronde for Email.
  2. 🔄 ESP Integration – Supports Salesforce Marketing Cloud, Pardot, Oracle Eloqua, Marketo, HubSpot, MailChimp, Klaviyo, and more.
  3. 🎨 Supports any type of graphic – As long as it fits within the dimensions set, export with ease.


How Does It Work?

  1. Create your visuals in Figma.
  2. Export images directly to Stronde for Email. If integrated with your ESP, you’ll also find them in your ESP’s media library.
  3. Use them in the HTML email templates available—fully optimized for mobile and dark mode.
  4. Send high-performing emails without needing to manually download, upload, and test images in your ESP.


Features

✅ Direct Figma-to-ESP export – Save time with seamless workflow integration.

✅ Optimized for HTML emails – Ensure images fit and render correctly in email clients.

✅ ESP-ready – Works with Salesforce, Pardot, Marketo, HubSpot, Klaviyo, and more.

✅ Cloud-based storage – Organize images in the Stronde for Email library.

✅ Perfect for agencies & teams – Anyone can use it, from designers to marketers.


📌 See how teams use Stronde for Email: strondeforemail.com/customers/


FAQ

How does this help with HTML email optimization?

  1. The plugin automatically compresses, scales, and formats images correctly for HTML email campaigns
  2. Images are never too big or too small, so you don’t have to double-check file requirements before launching campaigns.


Does this require coding knowledge?

  1. No! Simply export images from Figma and use them in your email templates—no developer needed.


Is this free to use?

  1. The plugin itself is free, but you’ll need a paid Stronde for Email subscription to access full HTML email functionalities.


What ESPs does the Stronde for Email support?

  1. Stronde for Email integrates with Salesforce Marketing Cloud, Pardot, Oracle Eloqua, Marketo, HubSpot, Klaviyo, MailChimp, and more.


📌 Check out all Stronde for Email integrations: strondeforemail.com/integrations/

accepted.description: Stronde for Email is a no-code email creation platform designed for enterprise organizations and agencies. It enables teams to create on-brand marketing emails

plugins.tagline: Seamlessly export Figma images into mobile and dark-mode optimized HTML emails, ready for your ESP

plugins.name: Change Text Field by ID
plugins.description:
A very simple plugin allowing you to set the text of a figma Text element by referencing it's internal node ID.

One way you can get the node ID of your text elements is by fetching your figma 'file' layout data via the figma file API end-point: https://api.figma.com/v1/files/${FIGMA_FILE_KEY}

Then look for your text element and identify it's corresponding ID field.

Else you could try using the 'Text node name to id' plugin.
plugins.tagline: Set the text of a Text element by referencing its node ID

97082.description:

Then look for your text element and identify it's corresponding ID field.

plugins.description:
If you love brewing decks for Magic the Gathering, you may feel frustrated with the tools available to you. If only there was a super fluid and performant digital canvas that could let you seamlessly organize and brainstorm decks... Oh wait that's figma!


Normally you'd have to copy and paste all the cards from a decklist into figma. This plugin makes it 100x easier by letting you just paste in a decklist and automatically place images of the cards you're considering into a figma file.


When you're done, you can export a decklist to go buy cards with online or put into Arena or etc. for playing.
plugins.tagline: Import and Export Magic Decklists

plugins.name: Color Nexus
plugins.description:
Color is one of the most important tools for designers. Beyond its intrinsic properties, design also requires attention to the combination, contrast, and harmony between colors.To address these needs, we created Color Nexus, To present the contrast and harmony between colors, making the analysis and adjustment process more intuitive, professional, and convenient.


ColorNexus v2.0

New Feature: Intelligent Image Color Extraction

Easily extract three sets of professional color palettes from any image! ColorNexus v2.0 utilizes multiple advanced algorithms to provide diverse color inspirations for your designs.


V2.0 Key Features:

  1. Multi-Algorithm Support: Different algorithms are used to extract color palettes, ensuring diversity and uniqueness.
  2. Quick Switching: One-click to switch between different color schemes, making the operation simple and reliable.
  3. Flexible Adjustment: Adjust the extracted colors freely according to project requirements.


Operation Steps:

1.Select an Image: Choose any image in your Figma document.

2.One-Click Extraction: Click the image icon to quickly extract a color scheme.

3.Freely Switch and Adjust: Click the image icon repeatedly to switch between the three sets of color palettes. You can also fine-tune the extracted colors according to your needs. ColorNexus provides convenient color adjustment tools.


ColorNexusV1.0

Key Features:

  1. In ColorNexus, you can adjust the hue values of a group of colors within the same color wheel, intuitively observing the angular positional relationships of each color on the wheel. This allows you to quickly identify whether they are complementary colors, analogous colors, or any other contrasting relationships.


  1. ColorNexus utilizes the HSL model, ensuring that hue, saturation, and lightness are presented in a symmetrical relationship, providing a reliable foundation for your color analysis. Simultaneously, each color's saturation and lightness are displayed on the adjustment axis, allowing you to gauge the contrast strength by their positions relative to each other—the further apart they are, the more intense the contrast. This empowers you to create a myriad of color combinations.


  1. Additionally, ColorNexus supports one-click switching between RGB and RYB modes, enabling you to view color contrasts that are more aligned with traditional art theories.


  1. Overall, ColorNexus not only helps you create a harmonious and visually pleasing set of colors but also ensures that these colors form an organic whole, rather than isolated individual elements.


Color Addition Methods:

Extract colors from Figma documents.

Input 16-digit hexadecimal color values.

Quickly add basic colors.


Color Output:

After adjustments, hover over the color block and click the download icon to export the color to the current Figma canvas.


Use Cases:

Starting from Scratch: Use ColorNexus to create a brand-new color palette.

Expanding Existing Tones: Input one or several tones and easily add more colors to complement them.

Inspiration Capture: Input beautiful color combinations into ColorNexus, which will display the relationships between colors, helping you better understand and adjust them, thereby improving your color adjustment skills.


Tips:

The RYB color wheel does not support hue adjustments because its color gamut has a nonlinear relationship with RGB, and RGB is the most accurate for adjustments on computers.

The color wheel's drag handle automatically avoids overlap when hues are close, making operation convenient.

With a clean interface that matches Figma's light and dark themes, ColorNexus runs quickly and smoothly, making it an ideal color adjustment plugin.
plugins.tagline: effortlessly combine colors

plugins.name: Stopwatch
plugins.description:
A simple stopwatch timer that counts up from zero and continuously updates your selected text layer in real time.

Great for prototyping timers, showing elapsed time, or just tracking activity in your design!


🔧 Features:

Live stopwatch with hh:mm:ss format

Start, Stop, and Reset controls

Automatically updates the selected text node in Figma

Lightweight and easy to use


📚 Instructions for Use

  1. Select a text layer in your Figma file
  2. Run the plugin: Plugins → Stopwatch Timer
  3. Click Start to begin counting up
  4. The time will update in your selected layer every second
  5. Use Stop to pause or Reset to clear the timer


📝 Note: Make sure the text node uses a single font like “Inter Semi Bold”. The plugin automatically loads the required font.
plugins.tagline: A simple stopwatch that updates your Figma layers in real time.

plugins.name: Logify
plugins.description:
Logify — Version Tracking for Design Systems


Keep your design system consistent — and versioned. This plugin helps you track changes to local styles and components in your Figma file, presenting differences in a clean, structured changelog directly on the canvas.


No need to log edits manually — Logify detects added, modified, and removed elements automatically.


What you can do:

  1. Compare current and previous file states
  2. Generate visual changelogs inside your file
  3. Group updates by Added / Changed / Removed
  4. Document design system evolution clearly

accepted.name: Pavel Grachev
accepted.description: Product designer. Focused on clarity, usability, and quality design systems.

plugins.tagline: Effortless changelog for your design system
